mainSequence.step: User A initiates a transaction on the Polkadot Ledger through the API Client.
The API Client sends a request to the API Server to process the transaction.
The API Server communicates with the Polkadot Ledger Connector to execute the transaction using the transact() function.
The Polkadot Ledger Connector completes the transaction and provides a response to the API Server.
The API Server sends back a formatted response to the API Client.
